caption: I think I've visited enough times to make a proper assessment at this point. Matt and Emma and the whole staff are fantastic. The ambiance is great, generally no TV on and always good music regardless of who's choosing the tunes. Their food selection is fun, most generally consisting of the NZ-style meat pies, sausage rolls, and their amazing pretzel with beer cheese. Not a huge menu, but quite functional. There were charcuterie boards pre-COVID, which haven't made their way back yet. Also, ice cream sandwiches from a local place.  Speaking of beer...I guess that's the point many folks are interested in when it comes to breweries. Matt is a true IPA wizard. He mostly makes New England style, and he does them so well. They also do some great, great saisons, good stouts, and pilsners on point. Now that the weather is warming up, too, I'm expecting to see sours back on the menu.  They've done a great job keeping staff and customers safe through the pandemic, and accommodate those who would sit inside (now that it's a thing again), outside, and take beers to go. Really can't say enough good things about this place. Check 'em out!
Great variety of beers, friendly staff
Love it! Great selection of IPAs.
I'm not local, stopped by because it was close to my hotel. Never had a pie like this before. Definitely recommend the lamb, best meal I have ever had at a brewery. Ended up taking an extra one home.

Really liked this place.  The beer was great - I tried a variety of styles and none disappointed.  I especially liked their IPAs, loads of good NE styles.  The staff was very nice, friendly, and knowledgeable.  Based choices off of their recommendations and they were spot on.  The space was perfect - not too large or small.  They had heaters for the outside spaces which was great when it got a little chilly at night.  Highly recommend and will definitely be visiting again.  Ended up leaving with a case of beer!  Update: closed inside due to MoCo COVID regs - responded by lighting up one of their outdoor heaters and had some new delicious beer. Love this place.
Man, the NZ Pilsner is wonderful!
Beer is almost too good - Hands down best place in Silver Spring. Staff is awesome and the pretzel with beer cheese is killer
Great atmosphere,  excellent social distancing.  Always fantastic beer selection
Good beer, good food, good staff.  Love it.
Great time as always!!!

Hands down our favorite Silver Spring brewery (and it's tough competition).  Every beer we've tried has been outstanding, the space is fun (love the games!), and the bartending are very helpful and responsive.  The owners are awesome and are Silver Spring residents who are very invested in our community.  They quickly shifted gears following the pandemic to contact-less ordering and we've picked up beer a bunch of times now since April - always feels very safe and we've really appreciated them continuing to provide us with delicious beer throughout this period.

Best lower alcohol beer I've tasted was their PiPA released on Pi Day 3/14, right before the pandemic closure. Good range of beers, and only place I've encountered New Zealand style brews, including a couple with spruce tips. Ordering for pick up very easy, with parking in front and in lot beside. A favorite place of my wife and mine. Many good Ethiopian restaurants nearby, including Beteseb just across the street. Enjoy!

If you're looking to escape for a safe, delicious outing that includes a beer and a snack, Astro Lab is the brewery for you. My take: Astro Lab is the best hazy/IPA brewer North of Veil (in Richmond) and South of PA. And their wide open bay windows, generous space between the tables, and diligent staff make it a COVID refuge for the home-weary as well. Definitely worth a stop.
Great beer, excellent food.
No variety. Of eleven beers, nine were IPAs. I ordered the "malty" lager. It tasted like a light IPA. Not everyone wants to drown themselves in hops.
Great friendly brewery that has a variety of brews!
What Else do you want? They’ve got good beer, and dank meet pies.
Great beer, great staff!
Love this brewery! Great ambiance and beer. Also, their pretzel was delicious. If possible, try to get your hands on their "Fresh As" IPA. Might be the best MD IPA I've had so far.

I came here with a fairly large group on short notice and the service was excellent. The staff brought out more tables for us, orders were prompt, and everything went very smoothly. Food and beer was also decent.
I love this place. The beers on tap are always worth trying. The spicy veggie pie is so good I always get 2.

Great beer in downtown Silver Spring. They only had 7 beers on tap when I went, but all were delicious. The giant pretzel was a solid appetizer. Lots of free parking lots around the area on weekends. Go if you like beer. If you don't like beer, they had two wine options and a cider.
Great beer. Family friendly. Solid food. Chill vibe. TV to catch some live sports. What more can you ask for.
Great beer, good service, fun games, and nice ambiance. Great date location!

My favorite brewery in the DMV. Rotating yummy selection of hoppy brews that won't burn your tongue off. Overall...Good quality beer and a pleasant atmosphere conveniently located near Silver Spring Metro station. A great addition to the already strong craft beer scene with longstanding community favorite Denizens around the corner.
No mates - Simcoe🍺

Had no idea this place was here! We stopped by after wandering around Silver Spring after we noticed the sign, and we were not disappointed. The pretzel we had was good, but more importantly, the beer is great! Service was top notch, with the staff providing great recommendations. On a hot summer day, it was great coming in here for a quick stop!
Awesome brewery, easy to get to, good beer, friendly people, cheap.  What more could you ask for!?
They are racist on Hispanics. I was very disappointed

Love AstroLab. Great selection of rotating and regular beers, heavy on the IPAs and New Zealand hops. "Rua" pilsner is a standout. Not a full restaurant, but there is a modest menu of snacks as well as "hand pies". I have a thing for the chicken curry hand pie. Kid friendly, with a kids snack platter available and board games. Small covered outdoor patio seating and long communal tables indoors.
Fun place to hangout especially in nice weather. Great beer, great feel, great pretzels! Love the pies too

Fantastic brewery. The staff is super friendly and the locale is well organized. Incredibly kid friendly as well. They have great beer but also good alternatives like wine and yummy bar food. Tons of parking in the back.
The service was insulting and predatory.
Cool vibe with a stellar roster of beers featuring some creative IPAs.

Great beer and great food! It’s awesome that they have giant pretzels and a nice selection of pies to include curry chicken (remains featured in the picture!). I highly recommend dropping by for a pint (or 3!) and a pie. They also do fresh poured crowlers to go.
Great team and beer!

Good craft beer with about a dozen taps and rotating beers.  The food is pretty good too; the pretzels are huge and very tasty.  The savory pies are also very good.  The space is nice and not too loud with a friendly staff.
Beer was good, we enjoyed the pretzel but wished we had something to dip it in that wasn’t mustard based. I’d definitely pay a little extra to get some melted cheese.
Great beers - probably best brewery in Silver Spring. Wasn’t overly crowded. Friendly staff and enjoyed the board game collection. Will definitely be back.

Really impressive for such a new brewery.  The tasting room was clean, tasteful and had a nice relaxed vibe.  The beers were surprisingly well dialed-in for such a new place -- good, balanced IPAs that tended toward the hazy/juicy side without being cloyingly sweet.  Well worth a stop.

If you're into hazy, hoppy beers this is going to be your new favorite watering hole in Silver Spring.  They've usually got a couple other styles on tap for those who prefer a stout or a lager.  All the pies are good, but I'm a huge fan of the butter crust ones.
Amazing beer!!! Very cool brand and facilities. Looks like the brewing operation is top notch. Some of the  best brewery food around, too. Be ready to hang out with a lot of young families with kids.
Nice brewery with great beer and friendly staff.

Great new brewery right outside DC. Beer selection was solid, staff was really friendly and answered all our questions, and the food options were really nice. Only complaint was a TV would be nice to be able to catch a game. But definitely worth stopping by. Will be back.
Great beer selection, the pretzrl is massive
Fantastic new Silver Spring brewery. Great selection of amazing beers, tasty food treats, and a friendly, accommodating staff.

Great brewery very close to the metro. Friendly staff, good food, and great beer. I tried a flight of every beer they had and l liked every single one of them. I ordered the minced beef and cheese pie and it was delicious. I will definitely be back. Can't wait for the brewery tours to be available.
Great craft beer and food, fun for family on weekends 12pm to 2am
Really yummy beer and great food! Love the IPAs and the pretzle, sausage roll, and various meat pies.

My 1st time here, didn't know it even existed until tasting beer at a Denizens Winter Cask event. We walked the few blocks and found Astro Lab packed out. Had some beer and enjoyed it. Nice variety of beers, good quality. Light food menu with pretzels and some "pot pies" among other things. Glad we have another brewery in Silver Spring. Look forward to seeing how Astro Lab matures.

Nice tap selection. Limited food selection but makes up in quality: ordered their lamb pie and it was delish! My friend had they steak and stout one, and he enjoyed it. Pleasant  and friendly staff. Would definitely recommend. Will go back and try their curry chicken pie
Solid IPA offerings
Great little brewery in Silver Spring! Highly recommend doing tasters of all their beer. Lots of IPAs and delicious stouts. Great option for beer drinkers and looking forward to going back.
Good beer and food, but a little loud
Great beer and munchies, friendly atmosphere.
Outstanding beer! The brewpub is really great also. It's got plenty of space. Delicious food/snacks also!

I love that more breweries are popping up in silver spring. Astro lab has set up a cool place and I've enjoyed their beer. The beer selection is a bit IPA heavy, but some are less bitter and more 'juicy' as they described it. Just ask one of the staff-they're great and super knowledgeable about their beer. It'd be awesome to see more non-ipa beers here.

Great experience! Loved playing boardgames and the variety of beers is a welcome addition to the DTSS community. If I have anything to add it'd be to note that most of the beers are IPAs which I'm not personally a fan of. But the milk stout is delicious so there's that.
Had a fun time with the group here. Enjoyed the brews and the service and the wonderful hand pie.
Crazy good beer and decent meat pies. If you can find parking this place is fantastic for bringing a date or just relaxing for the evening

First off I must say the food selection though limited was very good.  We had a steak and stout pot pie along with a local flavors platter.  Both were extreme good.  Now regarding the environment it was extremely loud and trying to order was very disorganized.  The place may want to consider noise damping pads in the ceiling or upper walls to help with the noise.  It was difficult to even talk without yelling.  That ought to be expected at a busy bar but as a result didn't say much eating.  To get a menu you had to go to the bar and then had to go to the bar again to place our order.  I had to almost push through people to get through the crowd to the bar.  Once you place your order I noticed there was some confusion later in the night when cashing out because credit cards are stored at two registers versus keeping it on file and giving you the card back or keeping it in one location.  Also, after ordering I was given two glasses of beer and an order number then asked to come back for plates and silverware.  It would make sense to me to have a common area for this or be willing to bring it to your table especially if servers would like a tip.  When receiving part of our order our number was then taken before all items had arrived and it was so loud and busy I didn’t expect our final item to ever arrive.  It did but then was asked if the other numbers left at our table were for other orders and everyone replied no.  As a result, the three numbers were taken away.  It was very busy for the space but seems like the place needs to work through better signage for water, reducing the noise especially with medium level music playing in the background and having menus at the tables or allowing for a more seamless way to order.
Denizens is going to have to up their game as the new kids on the block make  much better beers.
This beer is on point! Reminds me of aprés ski in VT!
Great beer, and great staff. Go serveral times a week after work.

Quality brews, full of flavor. A lot of hard interior surfaces creates a "noise box" effect when this place is full, perhaps they could cover the walls with something that absorbs sound? Astrolab get an A for beers, C for ambiance, four stars overall.
What a fantastic addition to Silver Spring. Great beers, yummy food and amazing service. Welcome to Silver Spring you are a fantastic addition.
Great beers.
Limited selection. Great service.

Decided to try this place on a surprisingly warm fall evening.  The beers (only 5 on tap so far since they just opened) are all good examples. The saison was crisp and tasty. The stout was good and not overpowering in chocolate and coffee notes. The pale ale and the 2 IPAs were also good, solid beers.  The meat pies were also quite tasty. I had the steak and stout pie. The crust is REALLY good, flaky and buttery.  I am looking forward to going back again.  The only criticism I have is that they don’t fill growlers, they only do 32 ounce cans (crowlers). I tried to get a grower filled and they said they don’t do them. EDIT: I received a response from the owners and they stated that they don't fill growlers because they don't have a way to sanitize them and ensure that they are not contaminated before filling. Fair enough, I hope that they add this capability in the future so they can keep up with every other brewery.
Good beers, friendly staff, and the tasty, authentic New Zealand pies remind me of home!
Love the Peekaboo IPA. The pies are delicious
Great space, great beer.  I hope the brewers will expand into more malty territory in the future.  Meat pies are outstanding.
Great Beer!!

Beyond impressive beer for a fair price. The brewmaster is clearly very skilled and deserves serious kudos. They have an entirely different style to Denizens, producing cleaner, crisper ales.  Not only is the stylistic differences evident in the beer, but in the ambiance as well. The atmosphere is "cleaner" and sleeker. Together the difference in aesthetics and brewing style result in a wildly different experience to Denizens, which is great, now Silver Spring has two distinct options. Which you prefer is personal preference.

Doesn't offer growler fills only crowlers at $12 which is very high for 32oz of beer.  Beer is good but not anything new or special. Service is just ok. Would go again but for a real brewery experience I would suggest other more major breweries in the area, 3 Stars etc etc.
Solid beer. The pies are good too, though the side salad was underwhelming for $4. Excited to see where this place goes.

Great beer in a location in the heart of Silver Spring!  The official opening day was hectic but the service held up, kudos to the staff. The meat pies are a unique and delicious accompaniment to the beers, we tried the veggie and the chicken curry. Both were excellent!

After months of anticipation, Astrolab's soft opening suggests the wait was well worth it! Great atmosphere and really, good beers. I particularly liked their Alfie stout and Birthday Wahine pale ale. Opening with four solid flagships (I assume), was smart and I can't wait for seasonal and rotating offerings. The food options are minimal but delicious; the service friendly and fast. Great addition to downtown Silver Spring!
Awesome beer, great service, fun environment

Delicious beer and pies. Tried the Birthday Wahine (pale ale), Ruru (saison), and Alfie (stout) as well as the Steak & Stout pie. Delicious and a welcome addition to Silver Spring. Looking forward to many more visits!
